lines: Jesu ndewangu Ndofara sei! Ndoraura mbiri Yekudenga;
Mudyi wenhaka ndakatengwa, Ndasambwa muropa reNyenye.
Ndiyo nyaya-nerwiyo rwangu, Kukudza Tenzi zuva rese,
Ndiyo nyaya-nerwiyo rwangu, Kukudza Tenzi zuva rese.
Ndinozvipira, nekufara, Zvno ndowona rufaro rwangu.
Ngirosi dzino-dzika pasi, Dzounza rudo netsitsi zve.
